column1: ' Updated by Ryo Suzuki and IlDucci
' Format changed by [big_fury]SiZiOUS to accept multiple characters
' Lines empties or with the ' character are ignored.
' The left value is the Shenmue code string (in hex form, like #$00..#$FF, or
' in decimal form, like #00..#255). Value < 0 or > 255 will be ignored. You can
' The right value is the Windows code string, it's a normal character.
' Note: if you want to translate the quote character ("), you must write it in
' This charset was updated for The Nozomi and the Motorcycle Editor
